org.mini2Dx.ui.input

Class GridUiNavigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.input.GridUiNavigation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UiNavigation

    public class GridUiNavigation
extends java.lang.Object
implements UiNavigation
    A UiNavigation implementation that treats all UiElements as placed inside a grid
